trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to iterate through subpaths in a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> and test the types of shapes contained in each subpath.
trans-unit.target: 提供在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 中逐一查看子路徑，並測試每個子路徑中含有之形狀類型的功能。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object for which this helper class is to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化這個 Helper 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 在傳回時，含有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示路徑中的點。

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 在傳回時，含有位元組陣列，這個陣列表示路徑中的點型別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 指定陣列的開始索引。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 指定陣列的結束索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> property and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> property arrays of the associated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: 將關聯的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> 屬性和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 屬性陣列複製至這兩個指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: 複製的點數。

trans-unit.source: Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data.
trans-unit.target: 使用`startIndex`和`endIndex`複製指定的路徑資料範圍的參數。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path.
trans-unit.target: 建立圖形路徑。

trans-unit.source: Populates it with several primitives and some markers.
trans-unit.target: 填入多個基本和某些標記。

trans-unit.source: Lists the path data on the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出在螢幕左邊的路徑資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and rewinds it.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>並倒轉它。

trans-unit.source: Increments the path data index to the second marker.
trans-unit.target: 遞增第二個標記的路徑資料索引。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.CopyData%2A> method to copy the path data contained between the start and end indexes to the points and types arrays.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.CopyData%2A>方法，以複製包含開始和結束之間的路徑資料點索引，而且型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出此複製的資料在螢幕的右邊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 取得路徑中的點數。

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 路徑中的點數。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`Dispose`允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>都重新配置用於其他用途的物件。

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 在傳回時，含有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列，這個陣列表示路徑中的點。

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 在傳回時，含有位元組陣列，這個陣列表示路徑中的點型別。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> property and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> property arrays of the associated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: 將關聯的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes" /> 屬性和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 屬性陣列複製至這兩個指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: 複製的點數。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path.
trans-unit.target: 建立圖形路徑。

trans-unit.source: Populates it with several primitives and some markers.
trans-unit.target: 填入多個基本和某些標記。

trans-unit.source: Lists the path data on the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出在螢幕左邊的路徑資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and rewinds it.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>並倒轉它。

trans-unit.source: Increments the path data index to the second marker.
trans-unit.target: 遞增第二個標記的路徑資料索引。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Enumerate%2A> method to copy the path data to the `points` and `types` arrays.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Enumerate%2A>方法來將路徑資料複製到`points`和`types`陣列。

trans-unit.source: Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出此複製的資料在螢幕的右邊。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the path associated with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> contains a curve.
trans-unit.target: 指示與這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 關聯的路徑是否含有曲線。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的子路徑含有曲線，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: 在路徑中的所有曲線會都儲存為序列的貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您新增橢圓形的路徑時，您指定左上角、 寬度和橢圓形之周框的高度。

trans-unit.source: Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: 這些數字 （左上角、 寬度和高度） 不會儲存在路徑中。相反地，省略符號會轉換成一連串的四個貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: 路徑存放區之端點和那些貝茲曲線控制點。

trans-unit.source: A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline.
trans-unit.target: 路徑會存放的陣列的資料點，其中每一個都屬於一條線或貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在陣列中的某些屬於貝茲曲線，然後<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A>傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If all points in the array belong to lines, then <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列中的所有點都屬於線條，然後<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines.
trans-unit.target: 某些方法壓平合併的路徑，這表示在路徑中的所有曲線會都轉換成線條的序列。

trans-unit.source: After a path has been flattened, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A> will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 路徑已經過扁平化之後，<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.HasCurve%2A>一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> class will flatten a path.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>，或<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>類別將簡維路徑。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object, `myPath`.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>物件`myPath`。

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 將三行、 矩形和橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object for `myPath`.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>物件`myPath`。

trans-unit.source: Tests to see if the current path `myPath` contains a curve.
trans-unit.target: 會測試目前的路徑`myPath`包含曲線。

trans-unit.source: Shows the result of the test in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在訊息方塊會顯示測試的結果。

trans-unit.source: Moves the iterator to the next marker in the path.
trans-unit.target: 將 Iterator 移至路徑中的下一個資料標記。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object to which the points will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 點複製至的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> object has a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 具有與其相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)" /> method increments the associated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object passed in to the parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)" /> 方法會將關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 遞增至其路徑中的下一個資料標記，並將目前資料標記和下一個資料標記 (或路徑端點) 之間包含的所有點複製至傳入至參數的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: 在這個資料標記和下一個資料標記之間的點數。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>方法來設定路徑中的標記。

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: 標記可用來建立子路徑的群組。

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: 一個或多個子可以是兩個資料標記之間。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers.
trans-unit.target: 將三個線條、 矩形、 橢圓形及兩個標記。

trans-unit.source: Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出所有的路徑指向左側螢幕的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>物件`myPathSection`中接收複製的點。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> method, which iterates to the first marker and copies all the points contained between that marker and the next to `myPathSection`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>方法，它會逐一查看至第一個標記並複製該標記與下的一個来包含的所有點`myPathSection`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of points copied to `markerPoints`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的點數複製到`markerPoints`。

trans-unit.source: Lists the marker number (the first marker) and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出的標記數目 （第一個標記） 和它包含在螢幕的右側，即點數目。

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that starts a subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] 提供給這個參數的整數參考會接收開始子路徑的點索引。

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that ends the subpath to which <c>startIndex</c> points.
trans-unit.target: [out] 提供給這個參數的整數參考會接收結束 <c>startIndex</c> 所指向的子路徑之點索引。

trans-unit.source: Increments the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> to the next marker in the path and returns the start and stop indexes by way of the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 遞增至路徑中的下一個資料標記，並經由 [out] 參數傳回開始和停止索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: 在這個資料標記和下一個資料標記之間的點數。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>方法來設定路徑中的標記。

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: 標記可用來建立子路徑的群組。

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: 一個或多個子可以是兩個資料標記之間。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse ¾ with markers between each.
trans-unit.target: 將三行、 一個矩形和橢圓形 ¾ 標記之間。

trans-unit.source: Draws the values for the array of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將點陣列的值繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> to draw the start and stop points for each marker to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 使用從反覆呼叫所傳回的值<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>繪製開始和停止點，針對每個標記至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Draws the value for the total number of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將點總數值繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the point type shared by all points in the group.
trans-unit.target: [out] 接收由群組中所有點共用的點類型。

trans-unit.source: Possible types can be retrieved from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 可能的類型可從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 擷取。

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] 接收點群組的開始索引。

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] 接收點群組的結束索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index and the ending index of the next group of data points that all have the same type.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有相同型別之資料點的下一個群組之開始索引和結束索引。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of data points in the group.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回群組中的資料點數。

trans-unit.source: If there are no more groups in the path, this method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑中沒有其他的群組，則這個方法會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 將三行、 矩形和橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Lists the values of all the points to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出所有點的左側螢幕的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and rewinds it.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>並倒轉它。

trans-unit.source: In a `for` loop, iterates through the points using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在`for`迴圈內，請重複使用的點<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to list the subpath number, the number of points in it, and the type of the path points to the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出子路徑的數字、 點，數目和螢幕的右側，即路徑點的類型會使用從反覆進行的呼叫傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: Displays the value for the total number of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 顯示螢幕的點總數的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that `ListPathPoints` is a helper function that separates most (not all) of the display code from the graphics path code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`ListPathPoints`是區隔大部分的 helper 函式 （並非全部） 的圖形路徑程式碼顯示程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Moves the subpath to the next subpath in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 將子路徑移至指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 中的下一個子路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> that is to have its data points set to match the data points of the retrieved figure (subpath) for this iterator.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />，將設定其資料點以符合這個 Iterator 之所擷取圖形 (子路徑) 的資料點。

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the current subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] 指示目前的子路徑是否關閉。

trans-unit.source: It is <see langword="true" /> if the if the figure is closed, otherwise it is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果圖形是關閉的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the next figure (subpath) from the associated path of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" />.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 的相關路徑取得下一個圖形 (子路徑)。

trans-unit.source: The number of data points in the retrieved figure (subpath).
trans-unit.target: 擷取的圖形 (子路徑) 中的資料點數。

trans-unit.source: If there are no more figures to retrieve, zero is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他要擷取的圖形，則傳回零。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers.
trans-unit.target: 將三個線條、 矩形、 橢圓形及兩個標記。

trans-unit.source: Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出所有的路徑指向左側螢幕的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>物件`myPathSection`中接收複製的點。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method, which iterates to the third subpath (figure) and copies all the points contained in that subpath to the `myPathSection` path, and also returns the number of points copied to `subpathPoints`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>方法，它會逐一查看到第三個子路徑 （圖） 並複製到該子路徑中所包含的所有點`myPathSection`路徑，以及傳回的點數複製到`subpathPoints`。

trans-unit.source: Lists the subpath number and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 列出子路徑的數目和螢幕的右側，即包含的點數目。

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] 接收下一個子路徑的開始索引。

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] 接收下一個子路徑的結束索引。

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] 指示子路徑是否關閉。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> to the next subpath in the path.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 移至路徑中的下一個子路徑。

trans-unit.source: The start index and end index of the next subpath are contained in the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下一個子路徑的開始索引和結束索引包含在 [out] 參數中。

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件中的子路徑數。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 將三行、 矩形和橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the values for the array of points to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將點陣列的值繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> to draw the start and stop values for each subpath to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 使用從反覆呼叫所傳回的值<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>繪製開始和停止每個螢幕的子路徑的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws the value for the total number of subpaths to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將子路徑的總數值繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Rewinds this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> to the beginning of its associated path.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator" /> 回轉至其相關路徑的開始。

trans-unit.source: The first time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>迭代器的方法，它會取得第一個圖形 （子路徑） 的迭代器的相關聯的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第二次，它會取得第二個圖形，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A> method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A>, the next call to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> gets the first figure in the path.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A>方法時，順序後，啟動，也就是您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.Rewind%2A>，下次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>取得路徑中的第一個圖形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> methods behave similarly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A>方法有類似的行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: 取得路徑中的子路徑數。

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: 路徑中的子路徑數。
